obi.prePaymentDetails.privilegeCode.null: Closed, except as in Commitment Letter
obi.prePaymentDetails.privilegeCode.NA: Closed, except as in Commitment Letter
obi.prePaymentDetails.privilegeCode.10: 10% once each 12-month period starting on IAD
obi.prePaymentDetails.privilegeCode.11: Prepay up to 15% once in each 12-month period and/or increase your Regular Payments by up to 15% once in each 12-month period
obi.prePaymentDetails.privilegeCode.15: Prepay up to 15% once in each 12-month period or pay prepayment charge
obi.prePaymentDetails.privilegeCode.29: Prepay up to 20% once in each 12-month period or pay prepayment charge
obi.prePaymentDetails.privilegeCode.31: Prepay up to 20% once in each 12-month period on a payment date or pay prepayment charge
obi.prePaymentDetails.privilegeCode.0E: Open except as outlined in Commitment Letter
obi.prePaymentDetails.privilegeCode.ZA: Prepay up to 20% once in each 12-month period or pay prepayment charge
obi.prePaymentDetails.privilegeCode.ZB: Prepay up to 20% once in each 12-month period or pay prepayment charge
obi.prePaymentDetails.privilegeCode.55: Prepay up to 10% of the Current Principal Amount once in each twelve (12) month period

obi.prePaymentDetails.penaltyDescription.ArmAlt: 5 months' interest during 1st year, 4 months' interest during 2nd year, 3 months' interest thereafter
obi.prePaymentDetails.penaltyDescription.ArmAlt-R: 5 months' interest during 1st year, 4 months' interest during 2nd year, 3 months' interest thereafter
obi.prePaymentDetails.penaltyDescription.ArmPrm: 5 months' interest during 1st year, 4 months' interest during 2nd year, 3 months' interest thereafter
obi.prePaymentDetails.penaltyDescription.FixedAlt-R: The greater of 3 months' interest or IRD
obi.prePaymentDetails.penaltyDescription.FixedAlt: The greater of 3 months' interest or IRD
obi.prePaymentDetails.penaltyDescription.FixedPrm: The greater of 3 months' interest or IRD
obi.prePaymentDetails.penaltyDescription.PVBond-C: Greater or 3 Months or Present Value
obi.prePaymentDetails.penaltyDescription.ARMREM: 5 months' interest during 1st year, 4 months' interest during 2nd year, 3 months' interest thereafter. No prepayment charge after 10th year.
obi.prePaymentDetails.penaltyDescription.FIXEDREM: 5 months' interest during 1st year, 4 months' interest during 2nd year, 3 months' interest thereafter. No prepayment charge after 10th year.

app.modal.increasePaymentDescription.lit: A payment increase request must be submitted 2 business days prior to your next regular payment date in order for the increase to be included. Otherwise, the increase will be posted for the payment immediately following.
app.modal.acceleratedDescription.literal: Accelerated frequencies pay off your mortgage faster by paying the equivalent of 13 monthly payments per year.
app.modal.canIncrease.literal: You can increase your payment between
app.modal.notElegible.literal: If you have already exercised your payment increase option within the current anniversary year, you are not eligible to increase your payment amount at this time.
app.modal.paymentsFirstAndFifteen.litera: Payments on the 1st and 15th of every month
app.modal.totalChangeDate.description: This amount is applicable to your next payment only.  Your regular payment amount of {{value}} will resume thereafter.
app.modal.totalDescription.M.frequency.l: Your regular monthly payment of {{value}} will resume every {{date}} of the month thereafter.
Your regular monthly payment of {{value}} will resume on the last day of each month thereafter.
app.modal.totalDescription.E.frequency.l: Your regular semi-monthly payment of {{value}} will resume every 1st and 15th of the month thereafter.
app.modal.totalDescription.W.frequency.l: Your regular weekly payment of {{value}} will resume every {{date}} thereafter.
Your regular weekly accelerated payment of {{value}} will resume every {{date}} thereafter.
app.modal.totalDescription.F.frequency.l: Your regular biweekly payment of {{value}} will resume every other {{date}} thereafter.
Your regular biweekly accelerated payment of {{value}} will resume every other {{date}} thereafter.
app.modal.paymentDescription.literal: Payment will default to last day of month.  Otherwise contact Customer Service.
app.modal.lastDayMonthly.literal: I want my payment to be on the last day of each month
app.modal.frequencyNotAllowed.literal: We require you to make your next regular payment before we can process this change. Please submit your request immediately following your next payment.
app.country.SouthGeorgia: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
